examples.text: Can you tell me how watson operates or learns
Tell me something about IBM Watson
Tell me more in details about Watson
How does machine learning happens in IBM Watson ?
How does watson understands and how does it responds ?
I need some information on IBM Watson learning
I want to know more about IBM Watson
how do you train IBM Watson ?
show me a video of watson's working

intents.description: About Watson as video content in response - demo

examples.text: Tell me, are you a human or no?
Am I talking to a Bot?
Am I talking to a person or am I talking to an AI?
Am I chatting with a human?
Are you a human or a bot?
How can you prove you are a human?

intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

examples.text: Please tell me the date and time ?

what's going on in the news ?

I think our street lamp's bulb needs to be changed

intents.description: Report a disruption of a utility service.

examples.text: What should I know about you?
I want to set up the chat bot for my shop
Do you know who you are?
Please tell me the weather outside.
How is the weather in New Delhi ?
How is the weather in London ?

how is the weather in New Delhi
Tell me the weather conditions for today
Can you tell me the status of weather outside ?
You gave me exactly what I need!
I'm looking forward to working with you again! :)
I like what you did there! :)
Can't believe you are that good
Tell me about what kind of things you do?
How can you solve my problems?

What kinds of things can you do?
What else can you help me with?
What can I ask you to do?

What are you able to deal with?

I do not know what to ask

Do you have a list of things I can talk to you about?

Would you please fix electricity connection?

What is the process for starting this service?
We completed the required building inspection so please connect the gas.
The house is backed up please check if the gas is working and begin the supply of gas to the house

I want a reconnection of my gas service
I need information on requesting service.
I'd like to get electricity in my house
How to reactivate my gas service?

Explain how to connect the electric service
How to get my power supply connected?
How I get power for the first time?

How do I arrange for my service to begin?

Do you have protection against hacks?
How do I know if my card info is kept safe?
How do I know this chat is not a scam?

I'd like proof of a secure chat
In what way can I tell if my plastic is safe?
Is there a reason to distrust this chat?
Is this a trusted chat site?
What guards do you have in place to protect your customer's data?
What safety measures are used to ensure that chat is secure?
Why would I trust this chat?

intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

examples.text: Please assist me to get to an agent

Yes, take me to a real person

I don't want to talk to a bot.
I don't want to talk to you

I want an agent to help me
I want to talk to a person
I would like to speak to a human
I would like to speak to someone
Is there anyone there I can actually talk to for real?
Can I speak to an advisor?
Please connect me to a live agent
Please let me talk to a human being.
Can I connect to an agent?
Can I speak to a human please?
Can I speak to a live person?

I can tell you my electric meter reading

Report usage registered on power meter

values.text: Thanks for your interest in IBM Watson.

generic.title: Here is a video on IBM Watson, about its learning, training and working.
generic.description: Show a video with a link to documentation

values: I'm your buddy, hidden inside this box.  I'm not a human but a machine.  I'm learning to know humans better.
I'm your assistant inside this box.  I'm just like any human, but a machine.  Gurvinder created me.

I am searching for the latest news.  Please wait for some time.
